channel.title: TimeProofs RSS
channel.description: Updates to the TimeProofs protocol, API, and site.

item.title: ProofSpec — Public draft v1
item.description: Open protocol to create, sign, timestamp, and verify digital proofs of existence.

item.title: Verify & Create Proof — Web UI
item.description: Hash locally, timestamp via API, and verify publicly from your browser.

item.title: API Docs — Timestamp & Verify
item.description: Reference endpoints for /timestamp and /verify with examples.

item.title: Security — Coordinated Disclosure
item.description: How to report vulnerabilities. PGP key and safe harbor.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Hash-only processing. No cookies. Edge-native security.

item.title: Legal — Terms of Service
item.description: Terms, acceptable use, IP, liability, and contact.

item.title: Use Cases
item.description: AI outputs, legal, research, creative, supply chain, and more.

item.title: Home — TimeProofs
item.description: The open standard for digital proof of existence.
